import FlowsheetWithColumnSpanActions from './FlowsheetWithColumnSpanActions?dev-site-example';

# Flowsheet Data Grid With Column Span and Actions

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Flowsheet Data Grid](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/flowsheet-data-grid/about) with column span and actions support.

<FlowsheetWithColumnSpanActions title='Flowsheet Data Grid With Column Span Actions' />

Note: Column Highlighting is not supported for columns with column span.
